partition

public static java.util.BitSet[] partition(java.util.BitSet[] sets)
Partitions a number of bitsets in disjunct parts.

Parameters:
sets -
Returns:
An array of BitSet[]'s representing which set is included (the set index of the array sets[] is now contained) set[0] = { 0, 1, 2 } set[1] = { 2, 3 } set[2] = { 4, 5 } => ( { 0, 1 }, { 2 } )
